description: SUSHIRO App for Android outputs sensitive information to the log file, which may result in an attacker obtaining a credential information from the log file. Affected products/versions are as follows: SUSHIRO Ver.4.0.31, Thailand SUSHIRO Ver.1.0.0, Hong Kong SUSHIRO Ver.3.0.2, Singapore SUSHIRO Ver.2.0.0, and Taiwan SUSHIRO Ver.2.0.1

enisaIdProduct.product_version: SUSHIRO Ver.4.0.31, Thailand SUSHIRO Ver.1.0.0, Hong Kong SUSHIRO Ver.3.0.2, Singapore SUSHIRO Ver.2.0.0, and Taiwan SUSHIRO Ver.2.0.1
